data.name: Quantum Conundrum Demo
data.detailed_description: When you arrive to visit your uncle, you notice something’s wrong. He’s not there to greet you and there was an explosion just as you arrived. Rescue your uncle using his newest invention, the Interdimensional Shift Device. Shift between five different dimensions in real time and work your way through his crazy complex mansion! Download the free trial today!
data.about_the_game: When you arrive to visit your uncle, you notice something’s wrong. He’s not there to greet you and there was an explosion just as you arrived. Rescue your uncle using his newest invention, the Interdimensional Shift Device. Shift between five different dimensions in real time and work your way through his crazy complex mansion! Download the free trial today!
data.short_description: When you arrive to visit your uncle, you notice something’s wrong. He’s not there to greet you and there was an explosion just as you arrived. Rescue your uncle using his newest invention, the Interdimensional Shift Device. Shift between five different dimensions in real time and work your way through his crazy complex mansion!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 Ghz / AMD Athlon x2 64 3800+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB / ATI Radeon HD 2900 512 MB
  • DirectX®:dx50
  • Hard Drive:1750 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX9 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS:Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 3 GHz E8400
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 9500 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2900
  • DirectX®:dx50
  • Hard Drive:1750 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX9 compatible sound card
